progetto.network.localconnection

Class LocalConnectionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.localconnection.LocalConnectionClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INetworkClient

    public final class LocalConnectionClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements INetworkClient
    A local client connection is a fake network connection that implements INetworkClient. All calls are blocking until they are solved on the other side. Calls are not parallel. Messages are sent even if the connection is closed.
